generated_body: The article likely discusses an unusual situation in which wild turkeys have become a nuisance in a specific town, prompting a response from an MLB player who is reaching out to the New Jersey governor for assistance. Readers may expect details on the impact of the turkeys on the community, including any reported incidents or concerns from residents. The piece could also explore the broader implications of wildlife interactions in urban areas and how local authorities are addressing such challenges, though this is not guaranteed.
